name: OctopusPromote
description: Promote an Octopus release from one environment to another
author: Octopus Deploy

inputs.name: From
inputs.label: Promote From
inputs.helpMarkDown: The environment the release is currently deployed to. e.g. 'Staging'

inputs.name: To
inputs.label: Promote To
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of environments to deploy to

inputs.name: ShowProgress
inputs.label: Show Deployment Progress
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the build process will only succeed if the deployment is successful.

inputs.name: DeployForTenants
inputs.label: Tenant(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Promote the release for this comma delimited list of tenants. Wildcard '*' will deploy to all tenants currently able to deploy to the above provided environment.

inputs.name: DeployForTenantTags
inputs.label: Tenant Tag(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Promote the release for tenants who match these tags and are ready to deploy to the provided environment.

inputs.name: AdditionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments to be supplied to Octo.exe. See [Octo.exe Command Line documentation](http://docs.octopusdeploy.com/display/OD/Promoting+releases) for available parameters.
